## About SpaceApps Challenge

The SpaceApps Challenge is our premier space-focused hackathon that brings together developers, engineers, scientists, designers, and space enthusiasts to develop innovative solutions for space exploration and Earth observation challenges. This event is organized in collaboration with space agencies and industry partners to address real-world problems and contribute to the advancement of space technology.

Each year, participants form teams to tackle challenges across multiple tracks, from Earth observation and climate monitoring to space habitat design and satellite communications. The hackathon provides a unique opportunity to work with space data, connect with industry experts, and potentially launch projects that could contribute to future space missions.
